title: Sridevi’s Daughter Jhanvi Kapoor Is Slaying The Internet With Her Thumkas! - Indiatimes.com
text:
Sridevi’s Daughter Jhanvi Kapoor Is Slaying The Internet With Her Thumkas! 352 SHARES February 19, 2017 352 SHARES Many star kids have not yet made it to the movies, but most of them have already become media sensations. One of them is Sridevi’s daughter Jhanvi Kapoor. In a recent video, she is taking cyberspace by storm with her dance moves and rightly so. The 19-year-old is slaying with her thumkas. Check her out in the video below. #young #cool #fun #glamorous #janvikapoor in #RineStoneTop #Red #Fringe #Lehanga #Skirt #NewLook #2017 #manishmalhotralabel #Beautiful #Timeless #manishmalhotraworld @mmalhotraworld #changing #New #Indian #Fashion #Style #love A post shared by Manish Malhotra (@manishmalhotra05) on Feb 17, 2017 at 2:25pm PST 
Designer Manish Malhotra uploaded the video on his Instagram handle, and the internet went crazy. Jhanvi Kapoor is reportedly wearing the designer’s creation. 
Another thing that has caught the attention of many is the boy who she is dancing with. The boy in the video is reportedly her rumoured boyfriend Akshat Rajan. She often posts pictures with him on her Instagram handle.
